Reference

All functions

get_epivars() id() date_onset() date_report() date_outcome() case_definition() outcome() gender() age() age_group() geo()

Accessor functfons

add_epivar() add_description()

Add or remove elements from the current dictionary

as.data.frame(<linelist>)

Convert a linelist object to a data frame

as_linelist() `[`(<linelist>)

Create a linelist object

clean_data()

Clean a data.frame

clean_dates()

Handle dates data

clean_spelling()

Rename values in a vector based on a wordlist

clean_variable_labels()

Clean variable labels

clean_variable_names()

Clean variable names

clean_variable_spelling()

Check and clean spelling or codes of multiple variables in a data frame

clean_variables()

Clean variable labels and fix spelling according to a wordlist

compare_data() print(<data_comparison>)

Compare structures of two datasets

default_dictionary() default_dictionary_path() get_dictionary() set_dictionary() reset_dictionary()

Linelist Global Variables

get_structure()

Extract the structure of a dataset

guess_dates()

Try and guess dates from a characters

list_epivars()

List registred epivars in a linelist object

lookup()

Lookup a column name defined by an epivar

mask() unmask()

Reversibly rename columns in your linelist with epivars

messy_data()

Function for generating messy data

print(<linelist>)

Function for printing linelist objects

set_epivars() reset_epivars()

Add epivars to a linelist object

template_linelist()

Generate a template for linelist construction

top_values()

Recode factors, keeping only most frequent levels
